message.packwizsu.restart_and_update: Updating the packwiz modpack and shutting down the server
message.packwizsu.no_bootstrapper: packwiz-installer-bootstrap.jar wasn't found within the root directory of the server
message.packwizsu.no_pack_toml: There is no pack.toml link to update from. Add this using /packwizsu link [url]
message.packwizsu.updated_toml_link: Successfully linked a Packwiz modpack! Use /packwizsu update for the changes to take effect
message.packwizsu.exception.file_update_: Failed to update the packwiz-server-updater.properties file within the root directory of the server
message.packwizsu.exception.malformed_ur: The link submitted is not a valid URL
